about_the_game:
Welcome to the Black Pine demo—a sneak peek into the gameplay and creative direction of our 4-player co-op horror survival experience. This 15 minute demo is just the beginning of a much larger game, with even more terrifying creatures, challenging missions, and dark secrets to uncover. We’re gearing up for the full launch in Spring 2025, and we can’t wait to share the next chapter of this chilling adventure with you.

We want Black Pine to be a game for the fans, shaped by your ideas and feedback. Join our Discord to share your thoughts, what excites you, what creeps you out, what you love, and what we can do better. Your input is critical in crafting a game that feels truly immersive and player-driven.

content_descriptors.notes: The game is in a setting that involves darkness, horror, some claustrophobia.  They will be attacked and killed by monsters, and will be able to see other players being killed.  There are also grotesque elements to the creatures and some items.

detailed_description:
About This Game

Every contract challenges your crew to work together, combining skills and strategies to tackle high-stakes repairs and get the job done. Split up to cover more ground or stick together for maximum efficiency—it’s all about teamwork. Share tools, communicate effectively, and stay focused on your goals to complete contracts faster and earn more cash. Prove your worth, rake in the rewards, and build your reputation as the best damn crew the Appalachians have ever seen!

Brave the rugged Appalachian wilderness to restore critical systems—power grids, water pumps, radar towers, and more! Stay alert as you hunt for hidden resources and clues that might explain the strange outages and eerie incidents plaguing the region. But it’s not just about fixing what’s broken—you’ll need to outsmart the lurking dangers and survive the hostile environment. Every repair edges you closer to uncovering something massive… and deeply unsettling.

Having the right tool isn’t just helpful—it’s essential. Each contract presents unique challenges, from fixing complex power grids to repairing water systems or radar towers. Whether it’s a heavy-duty wrench, a diagnostic device, or your chainsaw that is heavy, loud, and built for destruction! Using the right equipment can mean the difference between success and failure. Choose wisely, share tools with your team, and upgrade your gear to take on tougher missions. The better your tools, the faster you’ll work—and the more cash you’ll make.

short_description: Black Pine is a 4-player online co-op horror survival game where you and your crew are hired contractors, sent into the Appalachian Mountains to restore critical infrastructure after unknown events devastated the area. Take on important repairs and stay alert—nothing is quite as it seems.
